title: How much can you save when you trade-in for a Pixel 7?
description: You might even get the Pixel 7 for free when you give up your old device.

title: Google Pixel Buds Pro review: Great Android, even better for Pixel
description: Google threw everything at the wall, and most of it stuck.

title: Samsung could make a big change to the cameras on the Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Samsung could take away two lenses and replace them with a single lens.

title: Samsung confirms its Keyboard app caused One UI 5.1’s battery drain issues
description: Samsung has released a fix for the Keyboard app.

title: We asked, you told us: You’re divided over using Samsung Dex
description: Samsung Dex definitely has its fans, but there are also plenty of people who don't use it.

title: 2019’s FairPhone 3 is now getting Android 13, but there’s more to come
description: The Android 13 update comes despite Qualcomm no longer supporting the FairPhone 3 chipset.

title: Walmart’s new Google TV box is an absolute steal
description: Aside from 4K support and AV1 decoding, you're looking at a basic proposition. But who cares for just under $20?

title: This Xiaomi 13 Ultra accessory could almost make it a point-and-shoot camera
description: A camera grip accessory would be perfect for a top-heavy phone like the Xiaomi 13 Ultra.

title: Pixel Tablet leaks again showing a newly added hardware switch
description: Newly leaked renders show what could be a physical privacy toggle.

title: There’s now an app that makes Nearby Share work between Android and macOS
description: You can now send files from Android to macOS using Nearby Share, unofficially.

title: Android 14 will let you disable those pesky full-screen notifications
description: Full-screen alerts can be overkill for some, but a solution is coming with Android 14.

title: You can wear Xiaomi’s next fitness tracker like a pendant
description: The Mi Band 8 is no longer restricted to the wrist.
